name: Elio Qoshi (@elioqoshi)
content:
We will have our next Open Design Meeting on Vidyo as usual:

Date & Time: Thursday, 11th August 5PM GMT
Duration: 30-45min
Vidyo Room Link: https://v.mozilla.com/flex.html?roomdirect.html&key=NTr7t1TVKnnhKBCVCd74qw8Oo

Agenda/Notes/Questions:
https://public.etherpad-mozilla.org/p/open-design-meeting

Please add your topics or share-outs to the agenda!
The call will be recorded.

name: Elio Qoshi (@elioqoshi)
content: Let me know your email if you want to be invited to the calendar invite.
